subnet.description: The number of subnets allowed for each tenant.

network.description: The number of networks allowed for each tenant.

floatingip.description: The number of floating IP addresses allowed for each tenant.

subnetpool.description: The number of subnet pools allowed for each tenant.

security_group_rule.description: The number of security group rules allowed for each tenant.

security_group.description: The number of security groups allowed for each tenant.

router.description: The number of routers allowed for each tenant.

port.description: The number of ports allowed for each tenant.
